snippet: As part of a campaign to block loans to foreign museums with disputed objects in their collections, Turkey is refusing to lend artifacts to the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York and the British Museum and the Victoria and Albert Museum in...
abstract: As part of a campaign to block loans to foreign museums with disputed objects in their collections, Turkey is refusing to lend artifacts to the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York and the British Museum and the Victoria and Albert Museum in London, the Art Newspaper reported.

headline.main: Turkey Bars Loans to Museums in New York and London
headline.print_headline: Turkey Blocks Loans of Objects To Metropolitan Museum
